name: Five Nights at Shrek's Hotel
description:
Five Nights at Shrek's Hotel, get ready for your new job! There's nothing to worry about, you have your security cameras, and We have the special character, that sometimes likes to wander around the building, so make sure keep everything safe, keep an eye on Him, and good Luck on your first week!

Game also available at Gamejolt https://gamejolt.com/games/Shrek/504366
